# Max Uint8

> Maximum unsigned 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var UINT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint8-max' );
```

#### UINT8_MAX

Maximum unsigned 8-bit integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( UINT8_MAX === 255 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var UINT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint8-max' );

console.log( UINT8_MAX );
// => 255
```
